quest.name: One Last Bite
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
This subdued sentinel seems eager to get moving.
objectives: Deliver the provisions to Mjrl's Regret.
Deliver the heartfelt letter to the honey-blonde baker.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: Might I ask you to deliver a package?

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: To whom? I...I am not at liberty to say. A package will be made ready for you across the way. When you have it, see it is delivered to Mjrl's Regret.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: Provisions? Oh, yes of course. Here you are.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: I apologize for this. There is no reason anyone should ask you of all people to make such a simple delivery.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: I realize this is a needless burden, but it is not far.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: You came... Thank you. You brought the provisions, then?

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: Ah, I never tire of this bread. <sniff> <sniff> It smells of home.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: No, I should not think of home. I cannot go back. Not now...

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: Would you take this letter back to Fanow for me? A word of gratitude for the provisions.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: Farewell. May the blessings of the wood be upon you.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: You are returned. Were you able to deliver the provisions?

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: She really did it then. She always spoke of leaving Yx'Maja, of living free. But I didn't think...

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: Fitting that she would choose to leave at Mjrl's Regret. It is said the river was born from the tears of those who chose to leave the village.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: Before long they could no longer hear the call of the woods. They became strangers. That is the fate of all Viis who leave these woods, and still she chose to leave.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: She has ever been strong of will, and she will need that strength if she truly means to begin her life anew.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: I think your presence here inspired her. No doubt she was glad it was you who saw her off. She would want you to have this.

dialogue.name: QUIETVIIS03470
dialogue.text: Now if you'll excuse me, I have more provisions to prepare.
